<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save due date reminders"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/due-dates/reminders"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates or updates due date reminders for a ticket. Reminders automatically notify assigned agents, followers, or the requester before or after the due date, helping ensure timely ticket resolution.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **Due Date** – The ticket must have a due date set via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/due-dates](/docs/api/tickets/set-ticket-due-date).

**Workflow Example**
1. Locate ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `TicketId`
2. Set due date (if not set): [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/due-dates](/docs/api/tickets/set-ticket-due-date)
3. Configure reminders: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/due-dates/reminders](/docs/api/tickets/save-ticket-due-date-reminders) with reminder settings
4. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/due-dates/reminders/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-due-date-reminders) to confirm configuration

**Request Body**: Provide `TicketId`, `ReminderOffsetDays` (negative for before, positive for after due date), and notification recipients.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/due-dates](/docs/api/tickets/set-ticket-due-date) – Set ticket due date
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/due-dates/reminders/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-due-date-reminders) – View configured reminders
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-due-date](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-set-ticket-due-date) – Bulk set due dates

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for saving ticket due date reminders.","properties":{"Reminders":{"type":"array","description":"Array of reminder configurations to save.","items":{"type":"object","description":"A reminder configuration for ticket due dates.","properties":{"ReminderId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this reminder."},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Ticket this reminder is associated with."},"ReminderDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the reminder should be triggered."},"ReminderType":{"type":"string","description":"Type of reminder (e.g., 'Before', 'After', 'OnDue')."},"OffsetDays":{"type":"integer","description":"Days before/after due date to trigger reminder.","example":-1},"RecipientUserIds":{"type":"array","description":"Users who should receive this reminder.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"IsActive":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this reminder is active.","example":true}},"title":"TicketReminder"}}},"required":["Reminders"],"title":"TicketRemindersRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
